data.title: A Wondrous Past, a Dangerous Present: The Egyptian Temple of Akhmīm and the Martorana Church in Palermo, as Seen through Ibn Jubayr’s Travelogue
data.meta_description: A Wondrous Past, a Dangerous Present: The Egyptian Temple of Akhmīm and the Martorana Church in Palermo, as Seen through Ibn Jubayr’s Travelogue was published in Medieval Sicily, al-Andalus, and the Maghrib on page 127.
data.text:
Calasso, Giovanna. "A Wondrous Past, a Dangerous Present: The Egyptian Temple of Akhmīm and the Martorana Church in Palermo, as Seen through Ibn Jubayr’s Travelogue". Medieval Sicily, al-Andalus, and the Maghrib: Writing in Times of Turmoil, edited by Nicola Carpentieri and Carol Symes, Amsterdam: ARC Humanities Press, 2020, pp. 127-148. https://doi.org/10.1515/9781641893862-008
